name: Stupid Chess
description:
Help me out by donating so If you want to see multiplayer: Donate

Game may appear broken but it isn't. Wait a bit until it loads.

Controls

Move around with the WASD keys; Up is SPACEBAR; Down is LEFT-SHIFT.

Simply hold the left mouse button to drag/lift any chess piece.

Press ESC to forfeit (restart) the game.

Note

Drop your piece exactly over your opponent's piece to take it. Please report any bugs in the comments or to this email: isaak.eriksson@gmail.com
